alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rio Grande and south central Saguache Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Del Norte, or 39 miles northwest of Alamosa, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Rio Grande and south central Saguache Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
